text: Ara tamra nidarsanagulora madhye hacche ye tini bayuprabaha pathana susambadadatarupe, yena tini tomadera asbadana karate parena tamra anugraha theke, ara yena jahajaguli bicarana karate pare tamra bidhane, ara yena tomara anbesana karate para tamra karunabhandara theke, yena tomara krtajnata jnapana karate para.
